name: orthodoxy
content:

[ C ] the generally accepted beliefs of society at a particular time: The current economic orthodoxy is of a free market and unregulated trade.
[ C or U ] the traditional beliefs of a religious group or political party: She is a strict defender of Catholic orthodoxy.
[ U ] the degree to which someone believes in traditional religious or political ideas: His orthodoxy began to be seriously questioned by his parish priest.
